channel.title: Im in love
channel.description:
[img]http://www.southendmotorcycle.com/images/cb900f.JPG[/img]
CB900F Supersport
Dunno what it is about these bikes, but I've always loved them, even when I was only riding dirt bikes in fields for lulz. They don't like corners much, they provide 0 protection against the elements... but they're huge, torquey as fuck and just great fun
got one for essentially nothing, needs work but nothing a little mopman tlc will not cure
<- happy man
(shit now i have to insure the bastid)

item.title: Im in love
item.dc:creator: @cooper cooper
item.description:
@cooper wrote:

That looks very nice, congrats and good luck.
